tool_description: Fetche whether the domain is avaialable or taken. When taken, basic owner information is returned
name: Domain Available
title: Domain Available

api_list.name: Check Domain
api_list.description: Check whether a domain is available
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://domain-available1.p.rapidapi.com/api/rapi/whois/google.ca"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "domain-available1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://domain-available1.p.rapidapi.com/api/rapi/whois/{domain_name}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "domain-available1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
